name: Bold
description: You face danger without flinching. When you make a Fear roll, it is Favoured.

name: Cunning
description: You are resourceful and clever. When you roll to get out of a difficult situation by wit, your roll is Favoured.

name: Determined
description: Once per session, you may re-roll one die on any roll.

name: Eager
description: You throw yourself into new experiences. Once per session, you may declare any action Favoured before rolling.

name: Enemy-lore (Evil Men)
description: You have studied Evil Men and know their strengths, weaknesses, and habits.

name: Enemy-lore (Orcs)
description: You have studied Orcs and know their strengths, weaknesses, and habits.

name: Enemy-lore (Spiders)
description: You have studied Spiders and know their strengths, weaknesses, and habits.

name: Enemy-lore (Trolls)
description: You have studied Trolls and know their strengths, weaknesses, and habits.

name: Enemy-lore (Wargs)
description: You have studied Wargs and know their strengths, weaknesses, and habits.

name: Enemy-lore (Undead)
description: You have studied the Undead and know their strengths, weaknesses, and habits.

name: Fair
description: You are blessed with remarkable good looks. Rolls to make a first impression on strangers are Favoured.

name: Fair-spoken
description: You have a gift for saying the right thing at the right time. Your Courtesy rolls are Favoured.

name: Faithful
description: Your steadfast loyalty inspires trust in others. Your Enhearten rolls made in aid of companions are Favoured.

name: Fierce
description: You are terrifying in battle. Your Awe rolls against enemies are Favoured.

name: Folk-lore
description: You know the customs and traditions of the Free Peoples. Your Courtesy rolls when dealing with unfamiliar cultures are Favoured.

name: Generous
description: Your open-handedness wins you friends. Once per session, you may gain a Fellowship point by giving something of value away.

name: Grim
description: Your fierce countenance intimidates foes. Your Awe rolls to frighten enemies are Favoured.

name: Inquisitive
description: You are endlessly curious. Your Riddle and Lore rolls when investigating mysteries are Favoured.

name: Leadership
description: You possess the ability to direct others to action. When under pressure, other people naturally turn to you for guidance.

name: Patient
description: You can wait for the right moment. You may take an extra round to prepare, making your next action roll Favoured.

name: Proud
description: Your noble bearing impresses others. Rolls to interact with those of high station are Favoured.

name: Rhymes of Lore
description: You have memorised ancient verses preserving forgotten lore. Your Lore rolls to recall obscure facts are Favoured.

name: Rustic
description: Your down-to-earth nature puts common folk at ease. Rolls to interact with farmers, innkeepers, and tradespeople are Favoured.

name: Secretive
description: You are adept at keeping secrets. Rolls to conceal information from those who seek it are Favoured.

name: Shadow-lore
description: You have recognised the hidden thread unifying the darkness in Middle-earth. Your rolls to identify creatures of Shadow are Favoured.

name: Stern
description: Your iron will impresses those who might otherwise dismiss you. Enhearten rolls are Favoured when the situation is dire.

name: Suspicious
description: You are hard to deceive. Rolls to detect lies or discover hidden motives are Favoured.

name: Tall
description: Your imposing height makes you stand out. Rolls to appear impressive or authoritative are Favoured.

name: True-hearted
description: Your sincerity cannot be doubted. Persuade rolls when speaking the truth are Favoured.

name: Wilful
description: Your stubbornness is legendary. When making rolls to resist being coerced or manipulated, your roll is Favoured.

name: Burglary
description: This venerable talent includes pickpocketing, lock picking and, in general, any shadowy way to get hold of the possessions of others or access protected areas.

name: Keen-eyed
description: Your vision is exceptional. Awareness and Scan rolls in open terrain are Favoured.

name: Lordly
description: Your bearing commands respect. Awe rolls when dealing with mortals are Favoured.

name: Merry
description: Your cheerful spirit lifts the hearts of those around you. Enhearten rolls are Favoured.

name: Subtle
description: You are skilled at concealing your thoughts and actions. Stealth and Riddle rolls are Favoured.

name: Swift
description: You move with uncanny speed. Athletics rolls for speed are Favoured.

name: Wary
description: You are ever vigilant. You are never surprised and cannot be ambushed.
